text: E'ibora janapadara kichu birarana ami tomara ocarata barnana karai acho, sihamtara ocarata sihamtara raachulasakale spasta pramanasaha ahichila; kintu purbe sihamte yito micha buli agraahya karaichila seya duna'i bisbasa karaibalai sihamte manti nahaya. E'idarae'i allahe kaphirasakalara antarata mohara marai diye
